name: BloodBucket
description:
For the best experience, download the desktop version.

Blood Bucket

“Your local Blood Bank is in trouble, be sure to donate generously!”

In a world of darkness, (but not THE World of Darkness) blood is the only energy source running the city. Take control of the mysterious Janitor. A newly-sired vampire now working as the unwitting debt collector for the Black Cross, a shadowy vampire agency whose reach encapsulates all of Los Angeles. Shoot, stab, and occasionally bleed your way through a never-ending onslaught of enemies in this side-scrolling shooter inspired by the classic Thing-Thing arena.

Features
  • Over three weapons!
  • Over one level!
  • More than one SUPER COOL blood power!
  • Disgusting, revolting, legitimately crude art direction inspired by classic Newgrounds and old Nickelodeon cartoons!
  • Fanfiction-tier writing by a fanfiction writer!
  • LOTS of blood, but not enough to be considered NSFW!
  • Featuring thematic, moody acoustics from local musical talent!
Controls
  • A/D: move left and right
  • Space: Jump
  • Left Click: Shoot
  • Right Click: BLOODBUCKET
  • R: Reload
  • Shift: Blood Abilities (blood dash when moving sideways, blood pound when moving down)
  • Scroll/Number Keys: Change weapons
  • P/Esc: Pause
  • F11: Toggle Fullscreen
